0.cdata!:
Guinée - Projet de développement urbain
            de conakry

abstracts.cdata!:
The Conakry Urban Development Project
            will strengthen the operational capacity of Central and
            Local Government institutions responsible for urban
            development planning and urban service management in
            Conakry. To this effect, the project will fund: (i)
            technical assistance, training and provision of essential
            equipment to enhance The Ministry of Construction, Housing,
            Urban Planning and Domain (MCHUD)'s and the Conakry
            Administrative Region (RAC)'s capacity to plan,
            coordinate and control urban development in the Greater
            Conakry area; (ii) technical assistance, training and
            provision of essential equipment to develop RAC's
            ability to perform adequate technical and financial
            management of basic urban services (stormwater drainage
            network maintenance, garbage collection and service vehicle
            maintenance); and (iii) rehabilitation of existing and
            construction of new stormwater drainage networks to improve
            city-wide environmental conditions.
